Title: Home
Writer: Gerry Conway (based on the Marvel comics by), John Romita Sr. (based on the Marvel comics by), Ross Andru (based on the Marvel comics by), Steve Lightfoot (created by), Dario Scardapane, Angela LaManna (story editor), Ken Kristensen (staff writer)
Actors: Jon Bernthal, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ben Barnes, Amber Rose Revah
Plot: Frank makes a damning confession. A shootout leaves Sarah wondering what to believe. Rawlins goes in for the kill, once and for all.
